DOC.brief_summary: Study of seroprevalence of hepatitis E among HIV positive patient in Basque country, France in 2016.
DOC.brief_title: Seroprevalence of Hepatitis E in HIV Positive Patients in Basque Country in 2016 (VIhVhEpb)
DOC.detailed_description: Study of seroprevalence of hepatitis E among patient followed and treated in "centre Hospitalier de la CÃ´te Basque" for HIV infections. Study of acquisition of hepatitis E , and determination of liver status using fibrotest in co-infected patients with hepatis C and / or B.
DOC.criteria: HIV positive > 18 patient refusal for participation
